game.name: Hansel and Gretel
game.description:
The highly addictive and pleasing adventure has just begun! Where are you guys? All you need to do is just click the play button and enter this amazing mystery story that comes with the powerful characters and fabulous graphics. Your objective in this brand new adventure game is to solve the mystery and guide the characters to return to their home. They have come to you with a big hope so do not get them disappointed. Join Hansel and Gretel and help them to find out the apples and reach home safely in each level!

Hansel and Gretel are unable to find the way to home in a strange forest. Make sure that they collect all the apples scattered all around to collect extra points. Do not forget to keep your characters away from all the wild animals that you see along the way. Be careful as you will have no hints to use to complete your mission in this HTML5 platform game! Put your fingers on your mouse or tap the screen of your mobile phone to interact with objects and guide Gretel using the arrow keys.

Complete levels to collect points and buy new shoes to run fast, gingerbread magnet and survive one hit! The number of homes Gretel entered as of now will be shown on the top left corner of the screen. You can also track the number of apples you have grabbed till now on next to the number of homes. Challenge your attention and quick reflexes to complete all levels and become an adventure champion in just a few clicks! Good luck for a happy gaming experience!
